verbose_text: Furthermore, expression levels of MCT1 and 4 were significantly downregulated by 40 +/- 0.2% (p = 0.01) and 73 +/- 1 x10 -3% (p = 0.003), respectively, in the activated cells and thereby promotes less extracellular efflux and increased intracellular lactate concentration.
evidence: MCT1 and 4 were significantly downregulated by 40 +/- 0.2 % (p=0.01) and 73 +/- 1 x10 -3 % (p=0.003), respectively, in the activated cells and thereby promotes less extracellular efflux and increased intracellular lactate
